tool.name: Convert to FASTA (seqan3)
tool.help:
Fastq-to-Fasta-Converter ========================
POSITIONAL ARGUMENTS ARGUMENT-1 (std::filesystem::path) Please provide a fastq file. The input file must exist and read permissions must be granted. Valid file extensions are: [fq, fastq].
OPTIONS
Basic options: -h, --help Prints the help page. -hh, --advanced-help Prints the help page including advanced options. --version Prints the version information. --copyright Prints the copyright/license information. --export-help (std::string) Export the help page information. Value must be one of [html, man]. --version-check (bool) Whether to check for the newest app version. Default: true. -o, --output (std::filesystem::path) The file for fasta output. Default: stdout Default: "". -v, --verbose Give more detailed information here.
VERSION Last update: Fastq-to-Fasta-Converter version: 1.0.0 SeqAn version: 3.0.3
LEGAL Author: SeqAn-Team SeqAn Copyright: 2006-2021 Knut Reinert, FU-Berlin; released under the 3-clause BSDL.
